overview: 78 gunshots, 11 molotov cocktails - the end result: six dead, five seriously injured. Between July 2008 and September 2009 right-wing extremists in different regions of Hungary targeted Roma. In the sensational trial of four of the main perpetrators Eszter Hajd√∫ visited with the camera the courtroom and accompanied three Roma families in their sorrow and their hopes for a fair trial during the 167 days of hearings.
title: Judgement in Hungary
